name: The shadow puzzle sweets. Educational game HD Free
name_original: The shadow puzzle sweets. Educational game HD Free
description:
Puzzles-shape sorter. Sweets.

Our game (baby puzzle) will help your toddler to improve skills in solving complex tasks, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory.

Only four types of games:
- choose one figure of the three proposed
- to put one figure in the three proposed locations
three figures and three places for accommodation
one figure and six seats

The rules of the game
-Touch the screen and drag the figure to the desired location
Next You move on to the next stage of the game. Free game consists of two stages.
